img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Thunderclap_36.jpg)
You can still find another Clay Vajra to battle at the foot of the main stairs. It's a tougher fight than the previous one, and you'll be rewarded for besting it with the Clay Vajra Spirit to add to your collection.
img_below_text:
While looking up at the stairs leading up to the pagoda, take the path left to a side stairway going down and guarded by a Thunder Rhino Master.
![Wukong Thunderclap 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b4/Wukong_Thunderclap_37.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/78/Wukong_Thunderclap_36.jpg)
You can still find another Clay Vajra to battle at the foot of the main stairs. It's a tougher fight than the previous one, and you'll be rewarded for besting it with the Clay Vajra Spirit to add to your collection."
        - Following Text: "While looking up at the stairs leading up to the pagoda, take the path left to a side stairway going down and guarded by a Thunder Rhino Master.
![Wukong Thunderclap 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b4/Wukong_Thunderclap_37.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* approaching a large, ornate building at the top of a snowy staircase. The setting suggests the location of an upcoming encounter, possibly with a Clay Vajra or other enemies, as described in the preceding text. The surrounding environment features snow-covered ground, traditional architectural elements, and a serene yet foreboding atmosphere.
